transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji sir, good afternoon. Aaj sir aapne customer ji sir.
Customer: Are bolne to do yaar.
Executive: Ji sir bolenge. Ab kuch nahi bolna mere ko bolo aap.
Executive: Yani sir kya aapne customer care number pe call kara tha?
Customer: Haan kara tha.
Executive: To sir matlab mere upar ek concern open ho gaya hai ki aapne mere pe nahi call kare customer care pe kiya tha. To sir koi reason? Aise hi lag gaya tha galti se?
Customer: Haan galti se lag gaya tha.
Executive: Achcha. To mere upar concern jo open hua hai usko main close kar du? Sir.
Customer: Karo na aapko maine pehle hi bol diya tha kar do.
Executive: Haan haan lekin sir ek call to sahi hota hai na recorded. Haan haan sir sir aap ek mail jayega sir IndiaMART ki through aapke paas to usko please aap yes kar dijiyega. Theek hai?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan haan.
Executive: Ek mail jayega abhi main close kar rahi hu ek mail jayega usko aap yes kar dijiyega.
Customer: Kya likhna hai usme matlab kya kis pe click karna hai?
Executive: Abhi gaya nahi hoga abhi jayega jab main close karungi to but yes pe click kar dijiyega aur jo comment aayega aapko likhna hoga to aap likh dijiyega.
Customer: Nahi comment mein kya likhu?
Executive: Wo sir aap pe depend karta hai.
Customer: Nahi to abhi idea to do mere ko kya likhna chahiye waise basically.
Executive: Basically sir jaise matlab waise to aapne jo bhi call kiya hai wo galti se kara hai but ab mera hi feedback likhna hota hai aapko.
Customer: Achcha aapka feedback matlab kaise ki excellent work kiya aapne ya kuch achcha ya wo aap kya likhna chahiye mere ko batao to aap sir jo jo bhi matlab wo aap pe depend karta hai na sir main kya batau aapko mera feedback jo bhi aapko sahi lagta hai. Process hi nahi hai knowledge nahi hai na mere ko kis ke regarding kya likhna chahiye. Meri problem. Nahi feedback jaise regarding mere mera jo feedback hai aapke liye matlab mera feedback jo hai wo aap likh sakte hai ki aap mujhe kaisa feedback de rahe ho waise wo comment mein hota hai aur yes karenge to wo ticket close ho jayega.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai. Wo comment aapke paas bhi aayega kya maine kya comment kiya hai?
Executive: Sabke paas aata hai wo sir. Mere senior unke senior unke senior sabke paas aata hai.
Customer: Chalo theek hai bhejo aap main karta hu.
Executive: Ji. Theek hai and uska kya hua sir wo jo aapne pucha tha GST wala Aditya jiske company wale?
Customer: Are usme wo number wagera maine hataye hai wo actual mein kisi aur ke paas mein call ja rahe hai domain ke upar. To dekha discussion karte hai aap ek baar mere ko whatsapp pe batao ki apna wo wala jo stone gallery wala usko main start karaun to ek year ka minimum se minimum kahan se starting hai?
Executive: To aap jaise kaun sa wali service leni chahte hai? Minimum wala lena chahte hai ya fir thodi achchi service lena chahte hai?
Customer: Maximizer wagera ye to bhi hai na apne minimum se thoda sa upar wala.
Executive: To jaise aapka TrustSeal chal raha hai uske upar uske upar wala hi lena chahte hai aap?
Customer: Haan TrustSeal ka to jaise actual mein apna chal hi raha hai usse upar wala maximizer hota hoga.
Executive: Haan maximizer hota hai aur fir star ki service hoti hai. Star. Star ko to star ko to aap star ko to side mein rakh do. Maximizer uske bhi kya rate chal rahi hai per year ki?
Executive: Sir maximizer to is time pe 75000 plus GST chal rahi hai. But haan.
Hmm.
Executive: Aur aapka ye abhi new registration hoga matlab ki jaise aapka jo tha aapki profile jo hai Amit Marble Handicraft wali wo purani hai. Haan. To matlab wo already ispe chal rahi hai to main aapko uspe discount dilwa sakti hu aur us wale pe kitna cost hoga wo to mujhe sir se puch ke batana padega to main aapko ek baar puch ke bata deti hu maximizer ka.
Customer: Usko to hata do iski stone gallery wali hai na apni. Haan haan. Iski batao aap ye wali pe matlab kya maximizer ke kya charge lag jayenge kya discount milenge kitne buyleads milegi wo wali pe mere ko share karo.
Executive: Ek saal ki lenge?
Customer: Ek saal ki lenge abhi aage fir wo badha bhi lenge star wala lenge achcha return mila to apne ko.
Executive: Nahi jaise agar ek saal wala lete hai to thoda mahanga padta hai but do ya teen saal walo mein jyada sasta padta hai aur paise to aapke waise bhi pade rahenge hi pade hi rahenge paise aapke aur jab aap star lenge to aapke price adjust ho jata hai teen saal ke liye to free ho jata hai na aap jaise ek saal ka maan lijiye ki 65 ya 70000 hoga ek saal ka theek hai wahi do saal wahi do saal ka to nahi hota hai wahi teen saal ka 130000 hoga uska double jo hamare do saal ke liye hota hai bas usko plus one ka offer milta hai matlab ki 130000 plus GST mein aapko teen saal ka mil jata hai to agar aap usse average nikalte hai to ek saal ka kam padta hai aapko as compared to the per year wala.
Customer: Are nahi re are nahi re nahi bhai. Aap to ek saal ka batao aur badhiya se badhiya batao ki ek saal mein return mile apne ko kya karta. Theek hai. Paise paise paise chale jaye bhada rahe ho usko 35 40 mein ghent ke do na kahin yaar. Pehle bhi sawa saade char lakh ka package liya tha aapse to us time kuch return mila nahi. Sir ab mere sir mere mere hath mein wo nahi hota hai na main bas sirf baat karne se uska jitna bhi kam ho payega main utna karwa ke aapko final batati hu usme sir irritation mat kariye main apne according pura final karwaungi bataungi aapko. Kuch bhi final bhejo aap wo to baad mein dekhenge par ye aap pehle only for mere ko puch ke bhejo direct aap upar staff ke sir ko bhej dete ho na fir unke call aane start ho jate hai to ye sab bakwas kaam mat karna aap yaar. Aap hi se meri discussion. Sir wo to jaise main aapke price create karti hu na to price ke liye to hum jate hai approval lene ke liye ya fir discount lene ke liye to unke paas wo data save ho jata hai to fir wo aapko call karte hai wo senior ki call rehti hai mere. Chalo karo aapko. Wo fir theek hai main mana kar dungi main hi call karungi aapko direct. Theek hai. Theek hai sir. Theek hai sir. Aur wo yes kar dijiyega usko please apna concern close karne ke liye. Sure sure sure. Okay. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received calls from other executives.

- Wants best plan for one year with good returns.

- Wants maximizer plan details for stone gallery.



Resolution:

- Executive will provide maximizer plan details.

- Executive will ask senior about discount.

- Executive will not forward details to other executives.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share details on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- maximizer, stone gallery, discount, plan details, feedback
